headline: PPG Industries : , ArcelorMittal showcase milestone in low-carbon auto manufacturing
summary: Companies presented collaboration at SURCAR automotive painting conference CANNES, France, July 2, 2025 - PPG and global steel leader ArcelorMittal today announced a major step...
